info.name: Twilight Domain
info.description: The Twilight Domain from Tasha's Cauldron of Everything
info.author: Tasha's Cauldron of Everything

description.p: The twilit transition from light into darkness often brings calm and even joy, as the day's labors end and the hours of rest begin. The darkness can also bring terrors, but the gods of twilight guard against the horrors of the night. Clerics who serve these deities-examples of which appear on the Twilight Deities table-bring comfort to those who seek rest and protect them by venturing into the encroaching darkness to ensure that the dark is a comfort, not a terror.

sheet.description: The twilit transition from light into darkness often brings calm and even joy, as the day's labors end and the hours of rest begin. The darkness can also bring terrors, but the gods of twilight guard against the horrors of the night.

description.p: You gain domain spells at the cleric levels listed in the Twilight Domain Spells table. See the Divine Domain class feature for how domain spells work.

td.em: aura of vitality, leomund's tiny hut

description.p: When you choose this domain at 1st level, you gain proficiency with heavy armor and martial weapons.

sheet.description: You gain proficiency with heavy armor and martial weapons.

description.p: Starting at 1st level, You can see through the deepest gloom. You have darkvision out to a range of 300 feet. In that radius, you can see in dim light as if it were bright light and in darkness as if it were dim light. As an action, you can magically share the darkvision of this feature with willing creatures you can see within 10 feet of you, up to a number of creatures equal to your Wisdom modifier (minimum of one creature). The shared darkvision lasts for 1 hour.
Once you share it, you can't do so again until you finish a long rest, unless you expend a spell slot of any level to share it again.

sheet.description: As an action, you can magically share the darkvision of this feature with willing creatures you can see within 10 feet of you, up to a number of creatures equal to your Wisdom modifier (minimum of one creature).

description.p: At 1st level, the night has taught you to be vigilant. As an action, you give one creature you touch (including possibly yourself) advantage on the next initiative roll the creature makes.
This benefit ends immediately after the roll or if you use this feature again.

sheet.description: As an action, you give one creature you touch (including possibly yourself) advantage on the next initiative roll the creature makes.

description.p: Starting at 2nd level, you can use your Channel Divinity to create simple items.

You conduct an hour-long ritual that crafts a nonmagical item that must include some metal: a simple or martial weapon, a suit of armor, ten pieces of ammunition, a set of tools, or another metal object (see chapter 5, “Equipment,” in the Player’s Handbook for examples of these items). The creation is completed at the end of the hour, coalescing in an unoccupied space of your choice on a surface within 5 feet of you.

The thing you create can be something that is worth no more than 100 gp. As part of this ritual, you must lay out metal, which can include coins, with a value equal to the creation. The metal irretrievably coalesces and transforms into the creation at the ritual’s end, magically forming even nonmetal parts of the creation.
The ritual can create a duplicate of a nonmagical item that contains metal, such as a key, if you possess the original during the ritual.

description.p: Starting at 6th level, your mastery of the TWILIGHT grants you special abilities:

ul.li: You gain resistance to fire damage.
While wearing heavy armor, you gain a +1 bonus to AC.

sheet.description: You gain resistance to fire damage. While wearing heavy armor, you gain a +1 bonus to AC.

description.p: At 8th level, you gain the ability to infuse your weapon strikes with the fiery power of the TWILIGHT. Once on each of your turns when you hit a creature with a weapon attack, you can cause the attack to deal an extra 1d8 fire damage to the target. When you reach 14th level, the extra damage increases to 2d8.

sheet.description: Once on each of your turns when you hit a creature with a weapon attack, you can cause the attack to deal an extra 1d8 fire damage to the target.
Once on each of your turns when you hit a creature with a weapon attack, you can cause the attack to deal an extra 2d8 fire damage to the target.

description.p: At 17th level, the twilight that you summon offers a protective embrace:

ul.li: You and your allies have half cover while in the sphere created by your Twilight Sanctuary.

sheet.description: you and your allies have half cover while in the sphere created by your Twilight Sanctuary.
